base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray cabinet with a modern style.
part_description: Three sections with two doors each; vertical handles centered on each door.
internal_interaction_description: Each section has two doors that open outward, allowing access to internal shelves. The doors are hinged on the sides and close flush with the cabinet surface, providing a seamless look.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet is designed to stand against a wall, used for storage. People interact by opening doors via handles to access stored items. It can be placed in offices, kitchens, or living rooms, complementing modern decor.
